Name: avocado toast
Steps: put bread of choice in toaster and wait for 'ding!'
while waiting for toast, cut avocado into half and take out seed
scoop out avocado and cut into slices
once bread is ready, spread avocado slices evenely onto toast
use fork to help with spreading of avocado
drizzle 1/2 tablespoon of olive oil on toast
sprinkle salt and chilli flakes on top
Description: mac and cheese but a lil fancy
